amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force", $10,000,000 for the Science, Mathematics, And Research for Transformation (SMART) Pilot Scholarship Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3499 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S7372-7373; text: CR S7372) To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force", $10,000,000 for the Science, Mathematics, And Research for Transformation (SMART) Pilot Scholarship Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3499 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts.
